oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of genotype and feed allowance on behavior, performance and meat quality of free-range pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kongsted, Anne Grete
Therkildsen, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
Pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Use of traditional breeds and free-range systems based on natural foraging may be one way to improve the quuality of organic pork in a broad sense and thereby justify the larger price.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kongsted, Anne Grete and Therkildsen, M. (2014) Effect of genotype and feed allowance on behavior, performance and meat quality of free-range pigs. 65th Annual Meeting of the European Federation of Animal Science, Copenhagen, Denmark, 25-29 August 2014.
